details: The official start of ChemActiva Innovations Pvt Ltd.

event: Incubated at RISE Foundation IISER, IISER Kolkata
details: Began our journey at the innovation hub of IISER, Kolkata.

event: Awarded DST-NIDHI PRAYAS startup grants 10 lacs
details: Received a 10 lac grant from Savli Technology & Business Incubator (STBI), Gujarat.

event: Awarded HDFC Bank CSR Parivartan startup grant of amount 10 lacs
details: Secured the Parivartan startup grant of 10 lacs from HDFC Bank.

event: Selected top 10 startup in 'The BlueEconomy Mission 50 Accelerated Programme'
details: Recognized as a top 10 startup in the accelerated programme conducted by Bhubaneswar City Knowledge Innovation Cluster (BCKIC) Foundation and KIIT-TBI (Technology Business Incubator).
